name: Spiral's Demo
description:
Spiral is a third-person narratively driven exploration game sharing a poetic vision of cognitive degeneration seen from the inside.

In this demo, you will accompany Bernard as he explores his cabin, finding mementos that remind him of his life. This scene won't be in the final game and is more of a prologue or teaser to the game, giving you an idea of what we aim to create with Spiral!

Note: This is a demo for Spiral; it's entirely free! But we did want to leave the donation open, and since we can't input 0$, that's why there is a "suggested price" feel free to ignore it; our suggested price is 0$!
